subsections.title: ColorClimb - Computer Vision Tool for Indoor Rock Climbing
points: Crafted an application employing computer vision technology on iOS to identify colored pathways of rock climbing holds, enhancing accessibility for vision-impaired climbers.

subsections.title: Face Check - Facial Recognition for Classroom Attendance
points: Integrated Microsoft Cognitive Services API into a Raspberry Pi 3, establishing a prototype for facial classification-based classroom attendance tracking.
